sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {NavLink, useParams,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { userProfile } from '../../store/user'; import {deleteRsvp} from '../../store/rsvp'; import NavBar from '../Navbar/Navbar'; import './loggedInUserProfile.css'; function LoggedUserProfile({sessionUser}) { const user = useSelector(state => state.users); const [loading , setLoading] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {userId} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(userProfile(userId)); }, [dispatch]); function sliceTimeOffDate(){ let slicedDate = user.events.event_date.slice(0,10); return slicedDate; } return ( <> {loading ?
:

{sessionUser.username}

{sessionUser.user_bio}

Events I'm Hosting

{user.eventsHosting && user.eventsHosting.length > 0 ? user.eventsHosting.map(event => ( <>

{event.title}

{event.event_description}

{sliceTimeOffDate}

{event.event_city}, {event.event_state} {event.event_zipcode}

{event.category}
) ) :

You are not hosting any events.

}
<>

Events I'm Attending

{user.eventsAttending && user.eventsAttending.length > 0 ? user.eventsAttending.map(event => (

{event.title}

{event.event_description}

{sliceTimeOffDate}

{event.event_city}, {event.event_state} {event.event_zipcode}

{event.category}
)) :

You have not RSVP'd to any events.

}
} ) } export default LoggedUserProfile
